paragraph: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-largeUpdated 10:06 AM ET, Thu October 25, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.Washington (CNN)On Wednesday, suspected pipe bombs were addressed to the homes of former presidents Barack Obama and Bill Clinton, CNN's New York headquarters and the office of California Democratic Rep. Maxine Waters, among others. Those suspicious packages come on the heels of a similar one left near liberal billionaire George Soros' home earlier this week. THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE!
